metadata.synopsis: This lost film found in 1970 features dance numbers, pioneer special effects, animation, the Rhythm Boys with Bing Crosby.

reviews: An uneven (the comedy was lame) but most entertaining historical musical revue celebrating early talkies.
If one can look beyond its troubling historical context, one finds a stunning compilation of musical and theatrical talent.
A musical revue shot in early Technicolor and filled with eye-popping numbers, brief comedy sketches, and even a cartoon.
